Name: Structural, diffusion and rs-functional MRI data in Macaque Monkeys
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the paper in References and Links when using this data
Funding: The Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS) from the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (ANR-18-CE37–0022)
EthicsApprovals: The project was approved by a local ethics committee (CNREEA code: C2EA—14) and received authorization from the French Ministry of Research (MP/03/34/10/09)
ReferencesAndLinks: De Castro V, Smith AT, Beer AL, Leguen C, Vayssière N, Héjja-Brichard Y, Audurier P, Cottereau BR, Durand JB. Connectivity of the Cingulate Sulcus Visual Area (CSv) in Macaque Monkeys. Cereb Cortex. 31(2):1347-1364. doi: 10.1093/cercor/bhaa301
